description: This Python source file demonstrates how to use the OpenAITools for audio transcription and image generation, including downloading an audio file, creating agents with specific tools, and saving generated images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can utilize tools to perform tasks such as transcription and image generation.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent, including transcriptions or other generated content.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt, returning the response which may include images.
